abstract: BDT & Company, the investment bank run by the former Goldman Sachs rainmaker Byron D. Trott, is one of the primary advisers to Fairfax in its pursuit of BlackBerry. A deal would give the firm another prominent assignment in a year full of them.
snippet: BDT & Company, the investment bank run by the former Goldman Sachs rainmaker Byron D. Trott, is one of the primary advisers to Fairfax in its pursuit of BlackBerry. A deal would give the firm another prominent assignment in a year full of them.
lead_paragraph: Fairfax Financial Holdings’ $4.7 billion offer to take BlackBerry private has once again thrust Byron D. Trott into the spotlight.

headline.main: New Offer for BlackBerry Gives Buffett’s Favorite Banker Another Assignment

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
